text:
Want to join a virtual community for support with #COVID19 preparedness, infection control, and #vaccine distribution in your nursing home?
 
Sign up to join the 8,500 nursing homes enrolled in the AHRQ ECHO National Nursing Home COVID-19 Action Network: https://t.co/FV0bTNDXd0 https://t.co/U5o5PBpmU6
